articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.title: Stranded Deep has been released on Game Pass - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Stranded Deep has been surprise released on PC Game Pass, while five other games are due to leave the service later this month.
articles.content: Open world island survival game Stranded Deep has arrived on Game Pass, while five other games have been announced as leaving the service on January 15th. The leavers are The Anucrusis, Nobody Saves … [+1044 chars]
